column5: OCN Can ignore this until earnings honestly We are in a bearish wave Nothing can be done here for the bull case untilA CFPB Settles Stock will jump 50 overnightB A big investor filled the void left when we lost 10m in shares from big players like coopermanC OCN decides to do a share buyback since the price is so lowother than those 3 we arent going to see anything positive here until earnings if positive or 2020 when likely A or B happens Ive given up on OCN doing the smart thing with C
